description: 10-day, luxury solo itinerary in Malaysia (Kuala Lumpur & Penang only), departing Mumbai. Focused on 4-5 star city hotels, daily spa treatments, upscale dining, premium air/land transport, and exclusive private experiences. Strictly urban and culinary/cultural, with no island/nature segment.

activities: Fly Mumbai to Kuala Lumpur (morning). Private airport transfer to hotel. Check-in at 5-star city hotel (e.g., Grand Hyatt/Traders Hotel). Evening at leisure: explore KLCC Mall, dine at Marini’s on 57 (skybar with Petronas view).
itinerary.transportation: Return flights: Mumbai <-> Kuala Lumpur (premium economy, Malaysia Airlines or AirAsia X)
accommodation: Grand Hyatt Kuala Lumpur or Traders Hotel (3N)
itinerary.notes: All hotels are 5-star, highly rated for luxury, spa, and central location.

activities: Breakfast at hotel. Private guided city tour: Petronas Towers (morning visit), Merdeka Square, Sultan Abdul Samad Building. Lunch at Bijan (modern Malaysian, non-veg options). Afternoon: Signature spa treatment at hotel spa (2 hrs). Dinner at Nobu KL.
itinerary.transportation: Domestic flights: Kuala Lumpur <-> Penang (business class or front economy, Malaysia Airlines/AirAsia)
accommodation: Eastern & Oriental or Seven Terraces, Penang (4N)
itinerary.notes: Spa treatments are pre-booked at top hotel spas or reputable city spas for exclusive/private experiences.

activities: Breakfast. Visit Batu Caves with private driver. Explore Bukit Bintang (premium shopping: Pavilion KL, Starhill Gallery). Lunch at Lot 10 Hutong (non-veg). Afternoon: Spa treatment (Swedish massage or aromatherapy). Evening: Cocktails and dinner at SkyBar KL (Traders Hotel).
itinerary.transportation: All airport-hotel transfers by private car
accommodation: The RuMa or Sofitel Kuala Lumpur (1N, on return)
itinerary.notes: Dining is at premium restaurants, focusing on upscale non-vegetarian and fusion cuisine.

activities: Breakfast. Cultural day: Visit Islamic Arts Museum, Thean Hou Temple. Lunch at Entier (French fusion, non-veg). Afternoon high tea at hotel. Sunset swim at infinity pool. Dinner at TREC KL (trendy nightlife, premium dining).
itinerary.notes: Private airport transfers and select private city tours for comfort and exclusivity.

activities: Morning spa session (reflexology or hot stone). Check out, private transfer to airport. Flight to Penang. Private transfer to 5-star Georgetown hotel (e.g., Eastern & Oriental/Seven Terraces). Dinner at Indigo (European-Asian fusion). Evening stroll at Esplanade.
itinerary.notes: Estimated total cost: ~$2,000 (including flights, hotels, transfers, spa/gourmet experiences).

activities: Breakfast. Private George Town heritage tour (UNESCO sites, street art). Lunch at China House café. Afternoon: Signature spa (heritage or Peranakan-inspired). Sunset cocktails at Three Sixty Rooftop. Dinner at Suffolk House.

Morning spa or massage. Brunch at hotel. Explore Penang Peranakan Mansion or Pinang Peranakan Museum. Gourmet seafood lunch at Orinea by Farquhar Mansion. Free leisure evening: boutique shopping or café hopping.

Breakfast. Art & culture: Hin Bus Depot, local art galleries. Lunch at Kebaya (highly rated fusion). Afternoon spa (jet lag recovery package). Evening: Dinner at Gurney Paragon (urban mall, fine dining). Walk by Gurney Drive waterfront.

Check out. Private transfer to airport. Flight to Kuala Lumpur. Final night at 5-star KL hotel (e.g., The RuMa/Sofitel). Spa session or relax by pool. Last dinner at Marble 8 (steakhouse with city skyline views).
Breakfast at hotel. Free time for last-minute shopping. Private transfer to airport. Fly Kuala Lumpur to Mumbai.
